html.p: There are a number of steps that you need to do in order to prepare your SQL Server for this app. These include:

li.a: Enable PowerShell 3 on the SQL Server
Enable SQL Server to write to the Security Log
Configure an Audit Specification on the SQL Server
Configure the Base Audit Specification on the SQL Server
Install the Splunk Universal Forwarder on your SQL Server
Download and deploy required Splunk Add-ons

html.p: Once this is done, the lookup tables must be regenerated. Wait approximately 15 minutes, then run each of the Lookup Generators under Searches & Reports.
